pullrequest.title: handle inertia rotation and use full pose specified in sdf Inertial block

content.raw: One issue with this function is that it is non-reversible. Moving back and forth from one point to another will cause more inertia to be accumulated. Perhaps we should set a flag when this function is called the first time and give warnings for any subsequent times? Or we would need to keep track of the original cog and inertia values to allow for multiple correct moves.
